# Welcome!


My name is Camille Okonkwo. I am a second-year Sociomedical Sciences and Biostatistics & Public Health Data Science MPH Candidate at [Columbia University](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/). Before my time in New York, I recieved a B.S. in Public Health from my alma mater, [William & Mary](https://www.wm.edu/). I am currently seeking out Data Scientist and Public Health Analyst roles. For more information on my background, check out my [resume](resume.html).
